Articles.Content:
So, without ejected stage tracking currently, I had an idea inspired by Cpt Slugs flare part, that I\'m curious if is possible. Atleast, on a mod-able parts point of view anyways.

I\'m no programmer or I would have answered my own question, is it possible to make a sort of targeting bracket, using an emitted particle that always remains the same size, in relation to your screen? The end result being, as a stage floats away, it will always be visible? In a sense... So, does anyone know if it\'s possible?

Nope, sorry. It really needs to become common knowledge just how limited the game\'s modding capabilities are right now.

Only parts. No new planets, no new particles, new sounds means pushing the boundary... Dunno if this will change any time soon.
That\'s what i figured, but had to ask
